alert.note: Alert for Tonto Basin (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 7:46PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Gila County through 815 PM MST... At 746 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Roosevelt, moving southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Roosevelt. This includes AZ Route 188 between mile markers 237 and 242, near mile marker 244, and between mile markers 248 and 252. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
